entry.title: ACID Properties
entry.summary: ACID (atomicity, consistency, isolation, durability) is a set of properties of database transactions intended to guarantee data validity despite errors, power failures, and other mishaps. To understand ACID completely, we need to know about transaction. Transaction A transaction is a collection of queries or a single unit of work performed within a database management system against a databas...
